original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cittakadharakummassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena cittaka dhara kummassa ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, cittakadharakummo udakabhayā udakaṁ parivajjetvā vicarati, tāya ca pana udakaṁ parivajjanāya āyunā na parihāyati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja cittaka dhara kummaḥ udaka bhayā udakam parivajjetvā vicarati tāya ca pana udakam parivajjanāya āyunā na parihāyati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pamāde bhayadassāvinā bhavitabbaṁ, appamāde guṇavisesadassāvinā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena pamāde bhaya dassāvinā appamāde guṇa visesa dassāvinā

original: Tāya ca pana bhayadassāvitāya na parihāyati sāmaññā, nibbānassa santike upeti.
analyzed: tāya ca pana bhaya dassāvitāya na parihāyati sāmaññā nibbānassa santike upeti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, cittakadharakummassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: mahā rāja cittaka dhara kummassa ekam aṅgam
